column4: can someone help me configuring my wireless i really need help (its a USB adapter)
can someone help me configuring my wireless i really need help (its a USB adapter)
can someone help me configuring my wireless i really need help (its a USB adapter)
revildodral: problem is I just bought this thing... it recognizes the wireless network, but as if it didnt have any signal strength and with a lock next to it, i really dont know what to do
Is it a secured network? When you try to connect to it does it prompt you for a key?
yeahits my router that has WEP key and I have it but nothing works
nothing works ... what does it do when you select the network from network manager?
and it jost says "conexion failed"
Can you pls pastebin an iwconfig
ok.. can you send me the page to pastebin please i had it but dont really remember please send me a link
http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/36398/
ermkay .. can you click on the network manager applet and select "Manual configuration" from the menu
yes
select eth1 from the list and hit preferences
ok done then??
Is roaming mode selected?
actually no!... i configured it just as I did before in another laptop...
Oh, okay, try enabling that and then restart nm-applet ... I find that's typically a must for wireless cards
ammm how do i do that???
From preferences on eth1 under nm ... it should restart automatically once you apply the changes, but if it doesn't, nuke it from top or system monitor
ok ill try and ill beback in a sec
